detail_desc: Brazilian briefs in jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Brazilian briefs in jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Dance dress in glossy jersey with a glittery print, a seam at the waist and a layered tulle skirt. Lined skirt.
Short top in jersey with a sheen. Long sleeves and a deep V-neck at the back with a knot detail at the hem.
Short top in jersey with a sheen. Long sleeves and a deep V-neck at the back with a knot detail at the hem.
Jazz trousers in soft jersey with an elasticated waist.
Jazz trousers in soft jersey with an elasticated waist.
Soft slippers in velour with appliqués in the shape of a cat’s head with a unicorn horn at the front, and fish scales and a fish tail at the back. Soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Twill coat with a high stand-up collar, buttons at the front of the collar and a diagonal zip down the front. Front pockets and one inner pocket. Lined.
Double-layered hat in printed cotton jersey.

Leotard in glossy jersey with a glittery print on the front. Slightly wider neckline, 3/4-length sleeves and a lined gusset. Seam at the waist with a glittery elastic waistband and skirt in a double layer of tulle with a glittery top layer. The leotard comes with an elastic hairband that has glittery appliqués in the shape of cat ears.
Soft slippers in patterned imitation suede with elastication around the opening and lacing at the front. Terry linings and insoles and soft, imitation leather soles.
Glittery boots in imitation suede with a hook and loop fastening at the back of the shaft. Faux fur linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Blouse in chiffon with a V-neck, lace-trimmed flounces and covered buttons down the front. Long sleeves with smocking and ties at the cuffs.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a text motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a text motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Lace cardigan in a relaxed fit with long dolman sleeves. No fasteners.
Lace cardigan in a relaxed fit with long dolman sleeves. No fasteners.

Short dress in sturdy jersey with lace trims. Round, lace-trimmed neckline, a concealed zip at the back, long sleeves and cuffs with concealed buttons. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Short dress in sturdy jersey with lace trims. Round, lace-trimmed neckline, a concealed zip at the back, long sleeves and cuffs with concealed buttons. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
V-neck blouse woven in a patterned viscose blend with buttons down the front and 3/4-length raglan, balloon sleeves with gathers at the shoulders and buttoned cuffs.

Short-sleeved body in soft, stretch viscose jersey with a slightly wider neckline and press-studs at the crotch.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Lightly padded cardigan in a quilted organic cotton weave with concealed press-studs down the front and pockets in the side seams. Patterned lining.
Set with two hair clips and a pair of earrings. Hair clips in various designs in metal and plastic. Length 6.4 and 8 cm. Earrings in embossed metal with rectangular pendants. Length of earrings 4 cm.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Dress in a crinkled organic cotton weave with a frill-trimmed collar, buttons at the back and long raglan sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.

Fine-knit jacket in a soft viscose blend with a drawstring hood, zip and front pockets. Gently dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Trainers in mesh with imitation leather details and a lightly padded edge and tongue. Elasticated lacing at the front, a hook and loop tab at the top and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles, and chunky soles.

Short, thin metal chain necklace with shell-shaped pendants. Adjustable length, 39-47 cm.
Shirt in a soft cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Jumpsuit in a slightly stretchy, patterned cotton weave with a wrapover front and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam at the waist, a detachable tie belt, side pockets and short puff sleeves with pleats. Ankle-length, slightly tapered legs.
Large, rectangular hair clips in metal decorated with glass beads. Length 7.5 cm.
Large, rectangular hair clips in metal decorated with glass beads. Length 7.5 cm.

Cold shoulder blouse in airy, patterned chiffon. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, frill-trimmed smocking around the shoulders and long, wide sleeves with a flounce at the cuffs. Sweetheart neckline, a decorative drawstring with gathers at the front and a seam with concealed elastication and a flounce at the hem. Lined at the front. The polyester content of the blouse is partly recycled.
Top in sturdy, stretch fabric with a sweetheart neckline. Concealed elastication over the shoulders, short puff sleeves and a straight hem.

Hair clips in gold-coloured metal with glittery appliqués in the shape of unicorns with tulle tails. Length of hair clips 4 cm.
Suede sandals with straps that have metal buckles at the top and a strap with a hook and loop fastening around the heel. Suede insoles and textured soles.
Earrings in metal and plastic with a large, rectangular pendant. Length 7 cm.
Hoop earrings in metal with a lacquered finish. Diameter 4.5 cm.

Earrings in metal decorated with glass and pearly plastic beads. Length from 1.5 cm to 4 cm.
Metal hoop earrings with asymmetric plastic beads at the bottom. Length 5.5 cm.
Metal earrings in various designs decorated with sparkly beads in plastic and glass. One pair with pendants and 24 pairs of studs. Size from 0.2 cm to 2 cm.

Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with flatlock seams. Long balloon sleeves, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. Soft brushed inside.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in a sturdy cotton weave with a collar, buttons at the top and open chest pockets. Low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Seam at the waist with pleats at the front, shaping darts at the back and a detachable tie belt. Relaxed fit with a zip fly and tapered legs with flap patch pockets. Unlined.
Small fabric shoulder bag with a zip and adjustable shoulder strap at the top and a zipped outer compartment. Lined. Size 4x10x14 cm.
Small fabric shoulder bag with a zip at the top and a narrow shoulder strap with metal chain at each end. Two zipped outer compartments. Lined. Size 4x10x14.5 cm.

Calf-length dress in a jacquard weave made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Smartphone bag in soft, transparent plastic with an adjustable shoulder strap, zip at the top and a zipped outer compartment. Depth 5 cm. Width 10.5 cm. Height 15 cm.
